episodes.synopsis: Shiki learns he's an Oni when attacked by Momotaro.

episodes.titleEn: If You Want to Make It, Keep On Winning
episodes.titleJp: 成し遂げたいなら、勝ち続けろ
episodes.synopsis: Shiki wakes up confused in front of Naito, who explains the situation between the Oni and the Momotaro.
The first test the boys face to enter the academy is playing "demon catcher."
If they want to pass the test their teacher has given them, students must work together.
The students reach the Kyoto underground and discover new things about the war they are involved in.

episodes.titleEn: Even the Loner Path Has Its Limits
episodes.titleJp: 外の道にも限度があるだろう
episodes.synopsis: The undead attack the students and Shiki is forced to make a decision that will change his mind.
Yomogi uses his power to seal off the underground and the students must fight to survive.
Kuina fights a battle against another ugly, but this time he finds himself in a very delicate situation.
Gen’s peaceful solo camping trip is interrupted by a first timer without a tent.
Shizuku insists on camping with Gen until she's comfortable camping solo, so they go solo camping together.
Gen and Shizuku go shopping for camping gear together.

episodes.titleEn: What Do You Do While Camping?
episodes.titleJp: キャンプに行って、何するの？
episodes.synopsis: Shizuku is unable to explain why she wants to go camping alone, so she asks Gen for his thoughts.
Gen examines his feelings on camping with Shizuku, while Akihito hangs out with Shizuku and her friends.
Gen teaches Shizuku the basics of campfires.
Gen thinks back on his camping experiences and when he started camping solo.
Gen is appalled by the state of Shizuku's backpack and teaches her how to pack properly.

currentlyAiring.titleJp: あらいぐま カルカル団

episodes.titleJp: 始動! カルカル団! (仮)
ようやく始動! カルカル団!
届け! 魂のリリック!
撃退せよ! 不法侵入者!
見逃すな! 週末の残像[フラッシュバック]!

episodes.titleEn: Get ready! A Scorching Hot Closed Room!

episodes.titleJp: 疑惑! 俺たちの存在証明!
酔いしれろ! 2次元の誘惑!
感じろ! 言の葉の想い!
推せ! バーチャル少女A!
ボスカル登場! カルカル団大会議!
精算! コードをスキャンせよ!
燃えろ! 白熱のリモート会議!
魅せろ! 男の包丁捌き!
迫る! スペシャルイベント!
恐怖! ボスカルの視察!

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Scooped Up by an S-Ranked Adventurer
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 勇者パーティーを追放された白魔導師、Sランク冒険者に拾われる ～この白魔導師が規格外すぎる～

episodes.synopsis: Lloyd grows up under the tutelage of Merlin, then becomes an adventurer under the Hero. Later, he's cast out.
During his recruitment Lloyd learns the party's previous white mage has a sick sister, so he heals her.
After learning about their quest, Lloyd travels with his new party and fights monsters alongside them.
The party reaches their quest's farm and fights off thousands of manipulated monsters with Lloyd's support.
Lloyd and the party race back to aid Ishtar, only to encounter a group of demons holding a beastwoman captive.
Lina rallies Ishtar's defenders while Lloyd & Kureha free a 2nd horde of monsters and return to save Ishtar.

episodes.titleJp: ロイド、イシュタルを救う。
episodes.synopsis: Most monsters left, but golems are attacking Ishtar. Lloyd enhances the defenders and they save the city.

episodes.titleEn: Lloyd Stays at a Hot Spring
episodes.titleJp: ロイド、温泉地に留まる。
episodes.synopsis: The party rests in a hot spring town. Silica masters a spell. Daggas gets a shield. Llyod improves his magic.
After dying, Ryo Mihara finds himself reincarnated in a fantasy world with the ability to cast water magic.
Ryo encounters a castaway who requests his help.
Abel is welcomed back in the town of Lune and Ryo gets acquainted with civilization.
As Ryo settles into life as an adventurer, he has an unexpected encounter with a menacing foe.
The aftermath of the Great Tidal Bore brings visitors from out of town who might be just as troublesome.
As Abel escorts a team of academics through the dungeon, a strange warp puts them all in danger.
Ryo comes to Abel's rescue in the depths of the dungeon, facing off against mysterious enemies.

currentlyAiring.titleJp: アークナイツ【焔燼曙明/RISE FROM EMBER】

episodes.synopsis: Rhodes is negotiating with Wei regarding the situation in Lungmen and its imminent conflict with Reunion.
W is a Sarkaz mercenary, but the war will reveal that she is much more than that.
Rhodes Island infiltrates Chernobog's core city.
Despite the advanced stage of his disease, the Aegis of the Infected and his overwhelming might pose a formidable threat to Rhodes Island.
The Rhodes Islanders split into two teams to continue their mission both above- and below-ground.
It is a flame that she sought.
They have no future in the snowfield. This lifestyle is but a temporary one.
Doctor and Kal'tsit meet a transformed Eno at the sarcophagus.
Amiya confronts Talulah alongside Ch'en, who is trying to understand what happened to her sister.

episodes.titleJp: それは僕らの時間じゃない
episodes.synopsis: A new night begins as the other vampires offer to help Ko and Nazuna with their relationship. But what they really want, however, are the deets.
Ko's alarm bells go off when he meets Mahiru's new friend. Mahiru may not know what Kiku is, but Ko does.

episodes.titleEn: There aren't any ghosts in a haunted house.
episodes.titleJp: おばけ屋敷にはおばけいない
episodes.synopsis: A tense confrontation with Anko reveals an alarming secret: vampires have a weakness they didn't know about. Now, they all must decide their next move.

episodes.titleEn: Do you want to be able to run?
episodes.titleJp: 走れるようになりたいかい？
episodes.synopsis: Some patients say Room 307 is haunted, and Kabura warns Ko and Nazuna to stay away. Something's in that forbidden room. Something that might hold the key to the past.

episodes.titleEn: The few years I spent with you...
episodes.titleJp: あなたと過ごした数年間
episodes.synopsis: Kabura thought she'd be with Haru forever. But life never goes according to plan, even for vampires. Now Kabura is left with a burden she never asked for.

episodes.titleEn: I'm not asking about the quality.
episodes.titleJp: クオリティーを聞いてるんじゃねぇよ
episodes.synopsis: With Anko closing in, the vampires must destroy the source of their weakness before she can find them. Midori's search leads Ko and Nazuna to someone... unexpected.
When Ko finds the diary of a girl called Kyoko, he discovers that he wasn't Nazuna's first human friend. Nor the first person she ever considered turning...
What began as Kyoko and Nazuna's investigation into a supposed affair led to a life-changing event that altered their relationship forever.

episodes.titleEn: Yamori-kun, what do you want to do?
episodes.titleJp: 夜守くん、君はどうしたい？
episodes.synopsis: Vampires cannot be harmed by conventional means, so what does Anko hope to accomplish by shooting them out in the open? Ko suspects there’s a method to her madness.

episodes.titleEn: Like, This Is the Legend of the Giant Snake
episodes.titleJp: 大蛇伝説ってこれじゃんよ
episodes.synopsis: Okarun and Jiji find a hidden room where talismans are plastered everywhere, including the ceiling, walls, and floor. The front door intercom suddenly rings. Expecting Momo, they open the front door, only to find Naki and the Kito family members waiting for them. Meanwhile, Momo is in a pinch, being attacked by the Kito family men at the onsen...
Jiji tries to stop Momo and Okarun, who are being controlled by telepathic waves, from committing suicide.

episodes.titleEn: You Won't Get Away With This!
episodes.synopsis: Jiji's body becomes possessed by the Evil Eye.
Momo succeeds in bringing the Mongolian Death Worm to the surface.

episodes.titleEn: We Can All Stay There Together!
episodes.titleJp: みんなでお泊まりじゃんよ
episodes.synopsis: Momo succeeds in rescuing Okarun. They return safely to their home, but Jiji is still possessed by Evil Eye.

Jiji’s transformation into Evil Eye intensifies. The group tries to exorcize Evil Eye from Jiji’s body with a Hayashi performance. They invite the Hayashi and almost succeed in pushing Evil Eye out, but Jiji pleads with them to not kill Evil Eye...

episodes.titleJp: なんかモヤモヤするじゃんよ
episodes.synopsis: Seiko teaches Jiji how to hold back the Evil Eye. However, Jiji struggles keeping him at bay. Jiji turns into Evil Eye and assaults Momo. With some quick thinking, Momo somehow manages to get through the situation, while Okarun is determined to get stronger so he can send Evil Eye packing.

Okarun and Aira end up fighting against classical composers lurking in the school music room for training. Aira gradually gets the hang of it, but Okarun is unable to dodge the composers' flying musical note bomb attacks. Turbo Granny gives Okarun some advice, telling him to move his body to the rhythm.

episodes.titleEn: I Want to Rebuild the House
episodes.synopsis: The battle between Okarun and Evil Eye-fied Jiji has begun. Showing the results of his training, Okarun fights toe-to-toe against Evil Eye, going "full throttle." However, he can't fully defeat Evil Eye. And then, Okarun’s transformation is undone…

episodes.titleEn: The Secret Art of Being Attractive

currentlyAiring.titleJp: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

episodes.titleEn: A Colleague Arrives and Acts Unreasonably
episodes.titleJp: 同期が来たりて無茶を言う
episodes.synopsis: Monica Everett, the Silent Witch is visited by a colleague to go undercover at Serendia Academy.
Monica transfers to Serendia Academy after accepting the top-secret mission. Her mission is to secretly guard the second prince Felix without him noticing.

episodes.titleJp: セレンディア学園生徒会
episodes.synopsis: Monica is accused of being an accomplice for attacking Felix, so she looks for the culprit to clear her name.

Louis’s familiar Ryn was at the Serendia Academy to drop off his message when they detected an irregular mana by the boy’s dorm. When they went to the woods behind the dorm, they found Cyril losing control of his mana and slowly spreading ice around and freezing himself, too. Monica identifies the reason behind the mana rampage and finds out that there’s a culprit behind it. The hidden secret of the student council gets unveiled.

episodes.titleEn: The Adventure of the Silent Witch
episodes.synopsis: It's the weekend and Monica is freed from her duty, so she decides to go to the city of Craeme with Nero.

Serendia Academy is a distinguished academy dedicated to nurturing refined ladies and gentlemen, so girls are required to take ballroom dancing and tea party classes. Since Monica lived in isolation in a mountain cabin for a long time, she must re-take her ballroom dance test. Monica was already struggling, and to make matters worse, the tea party announcement was made. Her group is Monica’s friends Lana Colette and Casey Grove, as well as Claudia who is an intelligent woman known as the “walking library.” How will the tea party and Monica’s re-examination for the ballroom dance go?
The ballroom dance re-examination test is over, so Monica is having a barbecue with Glenn and the others.

Monica is attending school for the first time in a week, so Lana and Casey hold a welcome back party for her. Claudia also joins and the girls have fun. Everyone is curious about the school festival that’s right around the corner. Casey is going to sell her embroideries at the charity bazaar, and Monica’s eyes light up when she sees them, so Casey promises to make one for Monica, too. That same day after school, supplies are delivered to the school, so Monica heads to the storage with Cyril. Casey fills in for the stage designer and accompanies them, but…
The assassination plot against the second prince by Spiralflame was thwarted by Monica the Silent Witch.
The aftermath of Kafka's transformation and battle with Isao.
A challenge begins for the next generation of the Defense Force.
Kaiju No. 9 appears for the third time, splitting in two and overwhelming the Defense Force.
Kaiju No. 9 reveals his true plan.
Narumi and Kikoru’s resolve is renewed. Kafka is forced to face the price that comes with his power.
Reno Ichikawa has been chosen to wield the power of Numbers Weapon 6, the most powerful of them all.

During a town revitalization event at the White Snake Tsukumo Shrine, a sudden earthquake occurs. Sho Shinkai witnesses the destruction of a sacred artifact in the main hall of the shrine and injures his finger on a fragment he picked up. This was a sign of a quiet and strange occurrence. A few days later, rumors spread that a stone statue of a girl had appeared in the park. In response to this mysterious occurrence, Sho goes to investigate the rumor with his classmates Yoichi Fukazawa and Miyako Kujo to see if it is true. Is it a coincidence or fate? The "story" quietly begins to move.

A mysterious fire suddenly breaks out at Hakusen Academy. As the students are filled with fear, Shinkai Sho rushes around trying to save his younger sister, Shinkai Ten. Kujo Miyako, who seems to know something, offers to help Sho. As Sho and Miyako search for the cause of the fire, a supernatural being with the ability to freely control flames appears before them. Facing a threat that cannot be countered by common sense, Miyako activates her powers using an accessory called an "Artifact," which bestows special abilities. As danger looms, the two join forces to face the supernatural being. What fate awaits them at the end of the battle?

Miyako has been given the "power to take away ownership of other people's things" by the artifact. Sophitia also tells her that Sho has an unidentified power. With her help, Sho and Miyako begin investigating the culprit of the petrification incident. They discover a new use for Miyako's power and take a step closer to solving the case. The two of them build a strong bond through their investigation. However, Yuki Kia, who is pursuing the culprit of the petrification incident alone, appears and begins to suspect that Sho may be the culprit.

After reading Sho's memories, Miyako learns of his feelings for her. The two are no longer able to communicate as naturally as before, and their relationship remains strained, but thanks to Yoichi's arrangement, they have an opportunity to face each other. Overcoming their misunderstandings and confusion, Sho and Miyako begin to move towards a relationship where they can share their true feelings. But just then, along with rumors of a new "petrification incident," Miyako suddenly disappears. Feeling uneasy, Miyako tracks down Miyako using only a few clues, but...

Confused by the sensation that he has traveled back in time, Sho is overcome by a strong sense of déjà vu at the shrine. While investigating the source of this strange sensation, Sophie tells him that Sho may possess the power of a certain "special artifact." Meanwhile, Ten pursues the "Queen of Eden" to the shrine, where he encounters Harukaze, Renya, and the mysterious girl "Ghost" gathered. As he tries to get to the truth, he is noticed by one of the group and becomes embroiled in an unexpected event. ©Clearlove・Marvelous・Good Smile Film
Sekiguchi (later Hajime) was feeling depressed after a lot of things happened at work, so he transferred to a host club called "Club One." The club was staffed by unique hosts from another dimension!

Hajime tries to get through conversations with just "I see" and "That's true" while serving customers. To learn how to please customers with more than just talking skills, he decides to talk to the number 3 host, Senichi, who is a tough guy.
Hajime's salary is low, but the number two host, Ryoichi, notices this and offers to buy him a meal, and the two hit it off.
Hajime is troubled by a customer's advances. He is forced to make a decision about the after-hours services the host will provide.
Senichi has lost his number one spot in the social game score rankings. In order to spin the gacha, he gulps down champagne in his own way.
Koichi can revive infinitely even if he vomits. Rumor has it that before going independent as Club One, he worked at the legendary host club "Trillion".
Hajime doesn't have any regular customers. He wonders if he should change his appearance, so he decides to watch a makeup video by a famous Osaka host to learn more.
Ryoichi's original lighter for business purposes has gone missing. Ryoichi claims that Senichi stole it, but...

episodes.titleEn: 18th Drink: "Host looking up at the stars"

currentlyAiring.titleJp: かいじゅうせかいせいふく

episodes.titleEn: I Want You to Clean Up
episodes.titleJp: かたづけてほしいんだが
episodes.synopsis:
I'm a 28-year-old office worker who lives with monsters in Tachikawa.
The monsters' names are Mera, Gooska, Aniki, and Sugar.
Living together is just fun... but it seems that's not all that great.

episodes.titleEn: I Want to Go on a Diet
episodes.titleJp: ダイエットしたいんだが
episodes.synopsis:
I started exercising to try and get rid of my weight.
The monsters help me out, but it seems like more of a nuisance than a blessing.
And then, Sugar finally gets a great skill... but how?!

episodes.titleEn: I Want to Go Outside and Play
episodes.titleJp: そとであそびたいんだが
episodes.synopsis:
On a nice day, you took the monsters to the park.
The monsters were nervous about swinging on the swings for the first time.
But you taught them how to ride them... and they had a lot of fun!

episodes.titleJp: あ, ありがたいんだが

episodes.synopsis:
It's Children's Day.
The boss made the monsters helmets and swords out of newspapers.
The monsters are engrossed in play sword fighting.
There is one more thing in the sky that makes the monsters happy...

episodes.titleJp: 引っ越しそばなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
One day, a box of moving soba noodles was left in front of my house.
It seems that someone has moved in next door.
But they look like some pretty surprising people!

episodes.titleJp: あらたなかいじゅうたちなんだが
episodes.synopsis: It seems that two monster brothers, GaoGao and Garuga, have moved in next door. Will they be able to get along with the others?

episodes.titleEn: The House Next Door is Leaking
episodes.titleJp: お隣は雨漏りなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
The Gaogaru brothers live with a businessman a little younger than them.
They just moved in, and now their house is leaking...
They call for help, a skilled repairman!

episodes.titleJp: ねこししょうなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
The cat Shisho, the siblings' idol, seems to have learned a lot of things.
But he still hasn't mastered bath time.
The only way to surpass Shisho is to master bath time.

episodes.titleJp: かいじゅうたちのヒミツなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Mera, Gooska, Aniki and Sugar are not just cute monsters.
They each have their own incredible secrets!

episodes.titleEn: My First Time Meeting My Neighbor
episodes.titleJp: 初（はつ）お隣さんなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
This was your first face-to-face encounter with your neighbor!
Since you both live with monsters, you two seemed to hit it off right away.
With monsters so close by, could there be more out there...?!

episodes.titleJp: はじめての本屋さんなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
At the bookstore that you took us to, the monsters seemed to be fascinated by the dinosaur picture book.
But then they wondered, "What are dinosaurs?" You had trouble explaining it...

episodes.titleEn: I Go Out on Rainy Days
episodes.titleJp: 雨の日こそお出かけなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Mera and her friends go out wearing raincoats on a rainy day.
They bump into the Gaogaru brothers and end up going to a candy store.
Something unbelievable happens there!

episodes.titleEn: I Want to See a Shooting Star
episodes.titleJp: 流れ星を見たいんだが
episodes.synopsis:
It seems that if you make a wish on a shooting star, it will come true.
The monsters and I tried our best not to fall asleep while waiting for the shooting star...
but did everyone's wishes come true?

episodes.titleJp: はげましの辛ムーチなんだが
episodes.synopsis: It seems like the guy next door has had a bad day at work. When Master and Mera found out about this, they wanted to somehow encourage him, and Mera came up with a great idea... but is that really true!?

episodes.titleJp: 土用の丑の日はカップラ？なんだが

episodes.titleEn: The Friends I Met over the Summer
episodes.titleJp: 夏に出会った友だちなんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Mera and her friends go to the park wearing the straw hats that their master bought them.
There is a unicorn playground equipment there, and Mera puts her straw hat on the unicorn.
That night, something surprising happens!

episodes.titleJp: 夏まつりをやってみたんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Mera and her friends invite the Gaogaru brothers over to their master's house to play a summer festival.
Gaogaru has a blast and leaves, but what's the master's reaction next door?

episodes.titleEn: It's Important to Get Up Early
episodes.titleJp: 早起きが大事なんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Gusuka really wanted to see the morning glory flowers that bloom early in the morning.
Sleepyhead Gusuka tried his best to get up early, but was he able to see the morning glories?

episodes.titleJp: おいしい緑の大宴会なんだが
episodes.synopsis: My relatives sent me a lot of edamame beans, so I thought I'd share them with my neighbors, but instead they sent me a lot of bitter melon... We'll just have to have a party!

episodes.titleEn: It's So Hot, I Can't Stand It
episodes.titleJp: 暑くてたまらないんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Be careful even inside the house on hot days!
I prepared a secret weapon for the monsters staying at home alone...
I never thought it would turn out like this!!

episodes.titleJp: かき氷サイコー！なんだが
episodes.synopsis:
Shaved ice is the best thing on a hot day!
I made shaved ice for the monsters, but...
My brother, who loves cold food, helped me out!

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Rascal Does Not Dream of Santa Claus
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 青春ブタ野郎はサンタクロースの夢を見ない

episodes.synopsis: Sakuta has started attending university and meets a girl during a group outing.
Uzuki begins blending into her friend group’s dynamic as her popularity grows.
It’s the day of Sweet Bullet’s performance in an ensemble concert at a venue in Odaiba.

A Miniskirt Santa suddenly appears before Sakuta. She says her name is “Touko Kirishima” and claims to have been handing out Puberty Syndrome to people as gifts. Sakuta sees her eyes lock on Ikumi Akagi, a former middle school classmate who is attending the same university as Sakuta, studying in the nursing program. Curious about Ikumi, Sakuta goes on a group date with female nursing program students that his friend invited him to. There, they discuss a rumor about people’s dreams coming true after they post about them on social media with the hashtag #DREAMING...

A pumpkin lantern made of glass comes crashing down in a plaza in front of Sakuragicho Station, just as a social media post with the hashtag #DREAMING had predicted. However, Ikumi rushes in to protect a girl who was running directly underneath it as it falls, preventing any injuries. She believes the rumor about the #DREAMING posts and has been going around saving people. Ikumi visits Sakuta at the university and passes him an invitation to their middle school reunion. Sakuta warns her about helping people too much, but she ignores this advice...

episodes.titleEn: You and I Within the Realm of Memories
episodes.synopsis: A poltergeist-like phenomenon attacks Ikumi. Sakuta is worried the attack was caused by Puberty Syndrome, but Ikumi claims that the only way to fix this problem is by forgetting about Sakuta’s existence. Hearing this, Sakuta is stunned and confused. Without giving him the time to compose his thoughts, Ikumi proposes that they have a contest, competing to see if Sakuta will remember “that day” first, or if Ikumi will forget about Sakuta first.

episodes.titleJp: ヒルベルト空間の彼方から
episodes.synopsis: Upon searching the hashtag #DREAMING, numerous posts were found about attending a middle school reunion on November 27th. Ikumi also dreamt about the day of the reunion, but in her dream, she injured someone and was arrested.  Sakuta invites Ikumi to visit Minegahara High School, and there, he shares with her the various bizarre things about her that have been bothering him. On the way home, Ikumi suddenly says goodbye to Sakuta as they stand facing each other with the railway tracks in between them…

Sakuta from the other possible realm sends a message through Ikumi that reads, “Find Touko Kirishima, Mai-san is in danger.” After seeing this message, he tries contacting the Miniskirt Santa, who claimed to be Touko Kirishima. A few days later, he receives a call from her saying that she can meet on December 2nd… which also happens to be Mai’s birthday.

Gaku Kitada once dreamed of becoming a mathematician, but fails at the Math Olympiad. His passion for math gone, he now works at the school cafeteria and encounters culinary prodigy Kai Asakura due to a simple plate of napolitan pasta. The chairman demands Kitada's expulsion due to his failure, forcing him to make a difficult choice. Kai also happens to be catering the chairman's private dinner...

Gaku's "mathematical mind" Napolitan shocks the Chairman's guests at his dinner, delighting them. Kai invites Gaku out to introduce him as a symbol of the school, making him the kind of student that the Chairman is left unable to expel. Having experienced the joy of cooking from this incident, Gaku is invited by Kai to visit his Tokyo restaurant "K". There, Gaku meets Chef Ranna Akamatsu, who leaves him stunned with her delicious cooking. He uses his "mathematical mind" to uncover a hidden truth in his cuisine.

episodes.titleJp: 料理を以って、神に挑む
episodes.synopsis: Gaku, having satisfied Kai by discovering the hidden secret in Ranna's cooking, unexpectedly meets his childhood friend and Math Olympiad rival Kagura Musashi. Kagura looks at Gaku coldly, due to him having given up on the path to becoming a mathematician, and he ends up creating a meal using his "mathematical mind" for her. However, his attempt to surpass the ‘umami synergy’ as shown by Ranna fails miserably, when he was so sure it would work. Gaku finds a solution to his problem laying in the memories he has with his father.

Kai realized that the path of cooking led to the "Door to Truth." Gaku moves to Tokyo after graduating to live with Kai while working as an apprentice chef at K. Having seen through Gaku’s fatal weakness, Kai assigns him to create staff meals at K and, within a week, serve dishes that satisfy the whole team. Full of confidence, Gaku enters the kitchen at K, only to find a battlefield.

The nikujaga that Gaku served as his first staff meal failed to win over the entire “K” team. The sous-chef, Katsuya Hotei, harshly criticizes him, claiming that Gaku "does not see the people behind the food." Gaku begins to lose his way, failing to find his footing. In the midst of his struggle, he reconnects with Ayu Uomi, a former classmate facing similar hardships, and rediscovers the nostalgic flavors of his hometown. What kind of inspiration will Gaku draw from this one taste that has him on the verge of tears…?

Takeru convinces the staff at "K" with his "world-class meat and potato stew" that doesn't rely on nostalgia. After being welcomed into "K," Takeru is put in charge of the staff meals and begins to be highly regarded by the staff. However, as his days get hectic, a sense of frustration begins to grow within Takeru. One day, Takeru has an unexpected reunion with Hirose Ichitaro, a friend from elementary school who was the reason Takeru gave up on his dream of becoming a mathematician.

Gaku is asked to cook professionally for the very first time for the award ceremony to honor young math prodigy Hirose. He confides in Kagura that he's struggling with self-doubt, and she helps him redeiscover the joy of cooking. Reinvigorated with fresh passion, Gaku boldly declares that he will enter every category of the competition (appetizers, soup, and the main course) to determine who will cater the event.
Teaming up with Magoroku Inui, a senior chef close to him in age, Gaku works on crafting his dishes. And along the way, he uncovers a surprising truth about Inui’s past.

episodes.titleJp: 熱きコンペティション
episodes.synopsis:
“K”のスタッフによるコンベティションが始まった。渾身のスープを酷評されて孫六がくずおれる一方、岳は香港出身の王明剣、スペイン出身のペーニャ、海を尊崇する宍戸邦彦、そして蘭菜の過去とコンペにかける熱い思いを知る。
そして、ついに岳の料理が完成。大胆にも前菜、スープ、肉料理の3品目すべてにエントリーした岳が、海たち審査を担当する料理人たちに差し出したのは、たった一皿だった……！

episodes.titleJp: ときめき☆あたらしい出会い
episodes.synopsis: Himari and Mitsuki advance to the second year of Paradise Private Academy's junior high school. The two Star AiPri members are popular at school, while Tsumugi enjoys school life in the form of her stuffed animal Mugi-chan. Meanwhile, Himari and Mitsuki go to the AiPri Birth to meet a popular AiPri model who is the talk of the AiPri club. They find Julia taking pictures at a photo studio. Himari and Mitsuki quickly become friends with the cheerful Julia. The two ask Julia to perform a live show. However, Julia says that she doesn't feel any excitement at the AiPri live show...

A new member joins the AiPri Club. Her name is Igarashi Julia. It's none other than Julia, the AiPri model. Apparently, she was excited after seeing Himari and Mitsuki's live performance and decided to join the club. However, Julia says she can't perform live until she can sing perfectly. Wanting to know Julia's true feelings, Himari and Mitsuki decide to ask her to teach them how to pasha. As a thank you, they perform live. Mitsuki realizes that Julia really wants to perform live. In fact, there was a song that Julia had always wanted to sing.

Mitsuki picks up a notepad in the library. It was dropped by Julia's roommate, Rokudou Eru. From the notepad, Mitsuki learns that Eru is a popular novelist who writes Aipri novels. Meanwhile, Juria, who has the complete opposite personality to the quiet Eru, lives in the same room but they are always fighting. Juria becomes depressed, thinking that Eru hates her. Hearing this, Mitsuki goes to see Eru. Eru has an Aipri bracelet. She confesses that she loves Aipri but doesn't have the confidence to perform live, so she became a novelist. Mitsuki invites her to join the Aipri club...

episodes.titleJp: 対決！クリーニングマッチ
episodes.synopsis: Paradise Academy's annual event, the School Cleaning Match, is being held. It's a cleaning contest between teams. Juria and Elle, who tend to fight, end up forming separate teams to compete against each other. Meanwhile, Himari and Mitsuki, who have each become leaders of different teams, are cleaning together with their palm-sized stuffed animals, "Puri Usa" and "Puri Neko". However, Tsumugi is jealous of Himari and Mitsuki who only show affection for the palm-sized stuffed animals, and runs off somewhere with the chicks that Mr. Matsuoka keeps. Will Himari and Mitsuki be able to find Tsumugi? And what will be the outcome of the cleaning match?

episodes.titleJp: ひみつのアイプリコンテスト
episodes.synopsis: Princess Ring's butler, Shitsumu, makes an important announcement. The first Eye Puri Contest will be held! It's a contest to decide the world's best eye puri that will make Princess Ring's heart flutter, sparkle and be thrilled. The winner will be given an eternal outfit. To qualify, the "Ring Gauge" must be filled up. However, Himari and Mitsuki don't have much saved up... This time, the key is to succeed in the "Jewel Buzzrium Change" that Juria and El showed them. Mitsuki and Himari immediately go to ask Juria and El how to change into a Jewel Buzzrium, but...

Ever since seeing Himari and Mitsuki's live performance, Juria has become interested in duos. Eru has also been writing a novel with a duo theme. Encouraged by Mitsuki's words, Eru tries to invite Juria to join a duo. However, Juria has already received an invitation from another Aipri member. Eru is shocked to see Juria looking so happy. Juria encourages Eru, who is feeling down, and calls her out on a rainy day. However, the two get into a huge fight when Eru says she "doesn't like" a song that Juria loves at all...

episodes.titleJp: アイプリコンテストかいまく！
episodes.synopsis: Himari and Mitsuki are still depressed after failing to perform the Jewel Buzzlume Change. Mitsuki invites Himari to start training. However, worried that Mitsuki is pushing herself too hard, Chii gives Himari some advice. Himari tries to cheer Mitsuki up by organizing a "Mitsuki Love Party" filled with all of Mitsuki's favorite things. Can Mitsuki recover? Meanwhile, the first Aipri Contest begins. Their opponents are the duo "Love Juriel", consisting of Julia and Elle. Who will be the winner?

Himari and Mitsuki, winners of the first AiPri contest, will perform a debut live show in front of Princess Ring. Unable to hide their nervousness, the two join up with Julia and Elle and finally head to the palace where Princess Ring is. However, only those who are recognized by the princess at this live show will be able to meet Princess Ring. The Love Juliet duo perform a live show with excitement at full throttle. Poppin' Dreamin' also performs a dignified live show worthy of the name Star AiPri. After the two groups put on a fantastic live show, Princess Ring Clover finally appears before them...

A certain Aipri is very popular in Aipriverse right now. Apparently he is produced by a very talented producer, but he hasn't had any live shows recently. Meanwhile, Nanaura Subaru transfers to Paradise Academy, class 1A. However, because of his blunt and silent attitude, everyone around him is scared of him. Hiiro, who was walking in a hurry down the hallway, bumps into Subaru. Hiiro is scared, but when Subaru picks up something he's lost, he is surprised. However, Hinata sees what is happening. Hinata thinks that Subaru is scaring her sister, so she challenges him to a soccer match, but...

A famous singing teacher from overseas said that he wanted to produce Mitsuki. Mitsuki wants to take on the challenge, but is worried about leaving Himari behind. Himari is also sad to see Mitsuki go, but wants to support her friend's dream. Since then, Himari has started to work hard to be able to do everything on her own so that Mitsuki won't worry. After listening to Subaru and Wako's talk, Mitsuki has started to become conscious of her "new self." Will Mitsuki and Himari be separated like this?

episodes.titleJp: おとめのプロデュース
episodes.synopsis: Subaru has started singing again as an AiPri member. He is practicing alone, but the repertoire is not one that producer OtoP thought up, but something he came up with herself. Meanwhile, a transfer student, Nanaura Otome, comes to Himari and Mitsuki's class. She produces Paradise Academy to make school life more enjoyable. She also knows a lot about AiPri. Her true identity is Subaru's producer, OtoP. Himari and Mitsuki are surprised. However, when Subaru finds Otome, he suddenly runs away for some reason...

episodes.titleJp: とべ！ジャンピングロケット
episodes.synopsis: The second Ai-Pri Contest is announced. Himari, who has not yet been able to change into Space Buzzrium, is full of enthusiasm. Meanwhile, Otome tells Subaru that she does not need to enter the contest. Subaru tells her clearly that he wants to graduate from Otome's production. However, Otome insists that "absolutely not" and runs away without listening to what he has to say. Mitsuki, who gives Subaru advice, finds out that Otome and Subaru are from Ai-Pri School. Apparently, Otome was taking singing lessons at the time, but she had a "secret."

episodes.titleEn: My Melody and Kuromi Are Here
episodes.titleJp: マイメロディとくるみがやってきた
episodes.synopsis: Himari, Mitsuki, and Tsumugi meet My Melody at the AiPriverse. The three become friends and make a guest appearance on the "AiPri♪My Melody Channel" broadcast. The event is to give advice to the My Melody friends on their troubles. Then, Kuromi appears! Kuromi answers the My Melody friends' troubles by saying, "Just be like me!" But how can we become like Kuromi? When asked, Kuromi tries to teach Himari and the other AiPri how to "be like Kuromi"...

When Jumpin' Rocket decides to enter the second Aipri Contest, Shitsumu announces that they will be eligible to enter by the end of the day. Unlike Mitsuki, Himari is not yet able to change into a Space Buzzrium and feels anxious. At that time, Umi, a first-year elementary school student and classmate Nagisa's younger sister, comes to class 2A. Umi says she is a big fan of Aipri Himari. However, she gets into a fight with Nagisa and runs out of the classroom. When Himari finds out that tomorrow is Umi's "day to work hard at the hospital," she chases after her as the deadline for the contest approaches...

The final exams are over at Paradise Academy, and summer vacation is just around the corner. Mitsuki is writing a letter to someone. Himari wants to perform a live show, but Aipriverse is currently under maintenance. At Aipriverse, Aimu and the others are making a big fuss, saying that a ghost has appeared. As everyone tries to find out the true identity of the ghost, Aimu and the others end up becoming engrossed in Aipri's live show. However, in the midst of all this, the true identity of the ghost is finally revealed...

episodes.titleJp: 第２回アイプリコンテスト
episodes.synopsis: Finally, the 2nd Aipri Contest was held. Even before the live show, Otome is distributing Jumpin Rocket with Subaru to enliven the Pritomo and others. And finally, the contest begins. Both Mitsuki and Jumpin Rocket showed great performances. The one who wins is the one who enlivens more Pritomo. Which hand will win the championship...!?

episodes.titleEn: Mitsuki and the Start of Summer
episodes.titleJp: みつきと夏のはじまり
episodes.synopsis: The debut live performance of Eternal Space Coord is held. Subaru and Otome of Jumpin' Rocket show off a dazzling performance. The theme of the 3rd Aipri Contest is announced as "Animal Buzzlume Change". After "excitement" and "longing", what emotion will be the key next? Researching Buzzlume Change, training Aipri, a summer vacation... Chii proposes a summer training camp for the Aipri club to do it all.

episodes.titleEn: Would You Like Delichiious Shaved Ice?
episodes.titleJp: おいチィかき氷はいかが？
episodes.synopsis: During the summer vacation, the "Aipri training camp" of the Aipri club has started. Chii runs a shaved ice shop in the sea with Vivi. Vivi is a first-year junior high school student who yearns for Ipri. Himari and the others are all playing on the beach. Then Sakura, Tamaki, Airi, and Rinrin appeared from the sea! He temporarily returned home from studying abroad to be a special coach for the training camp. On the other hand, Vivi helped the shaved ice shop and said, "I don't like myself, so I want to be Chii-chan." In the meantime, Chii, who worked too hard on the work of the student council and the work of the shaved ice shop, collapsed...

episodes.titleJp: つむぎとサマーフェス
episodes.synopsis: During the summer vacation "AiPri Training Camp," Sakura and the others are conducting rigorous training. Tsumugi watches Himari and the others as they work hard. During the Aipri Birthday, energy is returning to Tsumugi's Aipri Brace. Upon learning this, Himari invites them to do a live performance right away, but Tsumugi says she wants to do a special live performance. In order to revive Secret Friends ∞, a summer festival "Aipri the Summer" is being held, produced by Oto-P!

episodes.titleJp: ビビはチィの一番弟子
episodes.synopsis: Vivi, who has become Chii's number one pupil, joins the AiPri club. Although she doesn't have an AiPri bracelet yet, Vivi desperately tries to keep up with the intensive training at the AiPri training camp. However, she pushes herself until she is completely exhausted and is scolded by Chii. Just as Vivi is feeling down, her advisor, Sarashina-sensei, appears and gives her an AiPri bracelet. Overjoyed, Vivi joins the AiPri-birth. Her registration as an AiPri is complete, and it's finally time for the live performance. However, when it's her turn to perform, Vivi doesn't appear on stage...

Vivi, who made a shocking debut, is being talked about among the PriTomos members as a possible winner of the 3rd Aipri Grand Prix. However, Chii is cold towards Vivi. In fact, she has been feeling anxious about Vivi, who achieved the Buzzlume Change at her debut live show. Sakura tells Chii, "There's something you're missing right now." Meanwhile, Vivi, wanting to be recognized by Chii, challenges Chii to a showdown. What will be the outcome of this showdown between master and disciple?

It's finally the final day of the AiPri training camp. With the 3rd AiPri Contest fast approaching, Juria is struggling with her summer homework. Himari and the others are trying out a live performance to qualify for the 3rd AiPri Contest. Himari, Mitsuki, and Tsumugi from Secret Friends ∞ successfully complete the Animal Buzzlume Change and secure their place in the contest. Chii tries with ease, but unfortunately fails to change into Buzzlume. Chii has lost sight of who she is...

episodes.titleEn: As of Today, I'm a Bad Girl! / I Wanna Be a Bad Girl! / Dog Ears and a Collar
episodes.titleJp: 1話 今日からばっどがーる♡／2話 悪い子になりたい♡／3話 首輪と犬耳／番外編 涼風さんは誤解されやすい
episodes.synopsis: Yuu Yuutani is a model first year student. However, to get the attention of her crush Atori Mizutori, Yuu decides to reinvent herself as the baddest of all delinquents!

episodes.titleEn: Natural-Born Ero-ist / Secret Club / Please Tell Me!
episodes.titleJp: 4話 ナチュラル・ボーン・エロリスト／5話 秘密のクラブ／6話 教えてください／番外編 るらちゃんはチヤホヤされたい
episodes.synopsis: Yuu plots to use her delinquent charisma to impress Atori by on a Student Council visit to a kindergarten.

episodes.titleEn: I Hate You / Is Ruu Cute? / First Kiss
episodes.titleJp: だいっきらい♡／るーってかわいい？／ふぁーすときっす♡／涼風さんは誤解されやすい
episodes.synopsis: Mistaking Yuu for one of her fans, school idol Rura offers to shake her hand. But Yuu is so preoccupied with thoughts of Atori that she won't even admit that Rura is cute.

episodes.titleEn: ADC Committee Assemble! / The Secret Classroom / A Rendez-vous with Rura Ruriha
episodes.titleJp: ＡＤＣ幹部総会ニ集合セヨ／秘密の教室／るりるら・ランデブー／るらちゃんはちやほやされたい
episodes.synopsis: Yuu is once again stalking Atori. She finds what she believes is a holy revelation from Atori left on a whiteboard.

episodes.titleEn: Shijimi and Hotate / Bool! / I've Got You Now!
episodes.titleJp: しじみとホタテ／わっこいい♡／まな板へようこそ／涼風さんは誤解されやすい
episodes.synopsis: Head library assistant Kiyoraka, is a faultless honor student. However, she has an unexpected hidden side and takes an interest in Yuu.

episodes.titleEn: Violent Times / Four-lling in Love / Heaven and Hell
episodes.titleJp: 時代は暴力／4(フォー)リンラブ／地獄で天国♡／涼風さんはとなりに居たい
episodes.synopsis: Yuu feels down about not being able to see Atori during Golden Week. She takes another blow when she hears that Atori is going to an amusement park with a special someone.

episodes.titleEn: Clothes Change Chaos / The Enemy Is Within the Classroom / Welcome to Cafe Scramble!
episodes.titleJp: 衣替えパニック／敵ハ教室ニアリ／『カフェ・すくらんぶる』へようこそ！／るらちゃんはちやほやされたい
episodes.synopsis: When Yuu stays after school to do some "birdwatching," or, taking secret candid photos of Atori, she encounters Mizuka!

episodes.titleEn: A Co-Ord Based on Vibes / Confession / She's Here!
episodes.titleJp: 感じるコーデ／こくはく♡／おられる♡／やっかいな先輩に気に入られてしまった後輩ちゃん
episodes.synopsis: Yuu comes up with a way to make Atori sign up for forest camp. Yuu soon finds herself in a tight spot on a different bus than Atori and Suzu.

episodes.titleJp: イケないこと♡／さらなるいただき／やっちゃおうかな♡／涼風さんは誤解されやすい
episodes.synopsis: いざ林間学校！のはずが、サービスエリアに置き去りにされてしまった優。頼みの綱だったスマホもバスの中…。途方に暮れる優だったが、同じくバスに乗り遅れていた亜鳥と打開策を考えることに。公衆電話から連絡を試みるも、涼も水花も電話に出ない。ヒッチハイクに望みをかける二人だったが…。

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Cultural Exchange With a Game Centre Girl
currentlyAiring.titleJp: ゲーセン少女と異文化交流

episodes.titleEn: Boy Meets the Game Centre Girl
episodes.titleJp: Boy Meets the Game Centre Girl
episodes.synopsis: While working at an arcade, Renji strikes up a friendship with an English girl who can't speak Japanese.

episodes.titleEn: If Pushing Doesn't Work, Try Pulling
episodes.titleJp: If Pushing Doesn't Work, Try Pulling
episodes.synopsis: Renji's sister Aoi asks him to make her a "game center pro" before she visits the arcade with her friend Lily.
After Renji and Lily go on their date, Aoi informs Renji that she invited Lily to come over for a study party.
Lily's jealousy is ignited when a pretty girl who visits the arcade turns out to be Renji's college classmate.
When Lily forces Renji to walk her home on a rainy day, the two happen to run into Lily's intimidating father.

episodes.titleEn: I Didn't Notice That At All!
episodes.titleJp: I Didn't Notice That At All!
episodes.synopsis: A new challenger shows up at the game center to compete for Renji's attention, but Lily steps in to stop her.

episodes.titleEn: All Work and No Play Makes Hotaru a Dull Girl
episodes.titleJp: All Work and No Play Makes Hotaru a Dull Girl
episodes.synopsis: Hotaru checks whether her classmates are engaging in meaningful activities in the arcade.
Bullied outcast Rudo finds respite in repurposing trash, until a terrible tragedy changes his life forever.
Cast into the Pit, Rudo is saved by the mysterious Enjin who may not have his best interests at heart.
Enjin teaches Rudo about life on the Ground, but an encounter with a churlish stranger may cut his time short.
After being introduced to Cleaner HQ, Rudo follows Riyo on a job to learn the business.
The Cleaners go on a job to save another Sphereite who survived the fall. Rudo tags along to learn more.
With the job having gone terribly wrong, Rudo finds himself face to face with a merciless Raider named Jabber.
Jabber employs a new strategy to get through Rudo's defenses, and another ally joins the fray.
掃除屋のボス・コルバスが帰還した。コルバスは仲間を命懸けで守ったルドに感謝し、掃除屋へと正式に迎え入れると、天界に関する情報を教える。コルバスによると天界と下界の狭間には《境界》があり、そこを越えると死んでしまうらしい。だが、とある場所に、《境界》を生きたまま越えた人間を知っている女性がいるという……。
High school girl Ruri meets graduate student Nagi while collecting minerals in the mountains.
Ruri is determined to find gold, but Nagi explains that it might not be as likely as she hopes.
Ruri meets Nagi's colleague Imari, and the three embark on a journey to find a lost mine.
In search of sapphire, Nagi teaches Ruri how to study sand, but Ruri prefers to hunt on a bigger scale.

episodes.titleJp: 見える世界、見えざる世界
episodes.synopsis: Ruri, Nagi, and Imari head to the beach in search of agate, and Ruri learns about the long lifecycle of rocks.

episodes.titleEn: A Closer Look Into the Blue
episodes.synopsis: Just as the group begins searching for sapphire on foot, Ruri uncovers a grave mistake that halts their plans.
Ruri finds sea glass on the beach and runs into her classmate Shoko, who has a secret passion for minerals.
Ruri teams up with Shoko for a science project, which takes a turn when they discover a strange, orange rock.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Puniru is a Kawaii Slime Season 2
currentlyAiring.titleJp: ぷにるはかわいいスライム 第2期

episodes.synopsis: After Puniru goes missing in the middle of training to become cuter, Kotaro receives an unexpected package.

episodes.titleEn: Going on a Journey with My Childhood Friend Slime in Another World. And Valentine's, Too!
episodes.titleJp: 異世界で幼馴染のスライムと旅した件。バレンタインもあるよ！
episodes.synopsis: Kotaro is hit by a truck and finds himself in a world of swords and sorcery. Puniru learns about Valentine's.
When Runru breaks down one day, Puniru and Kotaro must find a way to have her repaired, but at what cost?

episodes.titleEn: A Being More Perfect than a Toy
episodes.titleJp: ホビーよりもパーフェクトな存在
episodes.synopsis: After a science lab mishap, Dr. Mado unveils his latest creation: a super-intelligent robot made of slime!

episodes.titleEn: Puniru Powers Up?! See It for Yourself!
episodes.titleJp: ぷにるパワーアップ!? 君の目で確かめろ！
episodes.synopsis: Kotaro has big plans for the summer, but could he be his own worst enemy? Meanwhile, Puniru seeks to power up.

episodes.titleJp: 人間のハッピーエンド
episodes.synopsis: Gelee becomes the center of attention among the school's boys, including Kotaro, much to Puniru's chagrin.

episodes.titleJp: 真夏のルンルーンリゾート
episodes.synopsis: Alice invites Kotaro to stay at Runrune Resort, but all Kotaro can think about is Gelee and her advances.

episodes.titleJp: トリック　オア　かわいい！
episodes.synopsis: Gelee joins Kotaro's class as a student, to her chagrin. Meanwhile, Puniru plans a big surprise for Halloween.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

episodes.synopsis: Takuto wakes in a fantasy world with his Hero, Atou, and the use of game mechanics from a 4X strategy game.

episodes.titleEn: Let's Announce the Founding of Mynoghra
episodes.titleJp: マイノグーラの樹立を宣言しよう
episodes.synopsis: Takuto uses the Refugee system to welcome the dark elves into his nation, and learns of 2 Good nations nearby.

episodes.titleEn: The Time for Domestic Affairs Has Come
episodes.titleJp: 内政の時間がやって参りました!
episodes.synopsis: Takuto focuses on solidifying the foundation of his civilization, setting policies, and watching his home grow

episodes.titleEn: Life Doesn't Always Go Your Way
episodes.titleJp: 人生とはままならぬものですね
episodes.synopsis: The paladins from Qualia fight their way south and finally reach the Accursed Lands to face Atou.

episodes.titleEn: I’m the Monster You’ve Been Looking For
episodes.titleJp: お目当ての化け物ですよ
episodes.synopsis: Atou engages the Paladins in combat and learns several key details about the world her and Takuto now inhabit.

episodes.titleEn: King, Are You an Evil Person?
episodes.synopsis: Atou recruits little girls to care for Takuto. He helps them face their survivor's guilt over eating their mom.

episodes.titleJp: お友達になってください！
episodes.synopsis: Forngawn's Staff Holders visit Mynoghra, the sociable Pepe defusing tensions and forging an alliance.

episodes.titleEn: What a Human thing to do!
episodes.synopsis: The twins go to Dragontan with the human-obsessed Medic units to observe its culture. They befriend the mayor.

CITY—something happens every day. Tsurubishi dives a crispy fried noodle into a customer's bag, while Nagumo witnesses it. An absolute, desperate situation! Matsuri and Eri enjoying their after-school adventures. Todoroki and Onikamaboko struggle to create a joke for "Rakutan-kun." After hearing Niikura's dream, Nagumo starts thinking what they want to do. Something starting to blossom in CITY.

Perpetually broke Nagumo faces off against Niikura, who just wants her money back. When Wako joins in, their chaotic campus life kicks into high gear. Meanwhile, the CITY Minami Eleven soccer team scrambles to protect their always-injured ace, Sasago. Todoroki negotiates the fate of Rakutan-kun—testing the bond between editor and author. And the sun sets on CITY.

With a performance approaching, Tekaridake Theater’s leader, Tekaridake, tries to rally his unmotivated troupe. Sleepwalker Riko Izumi steals the heart of 16-year-old Tatewaku Makabe. Spring is just around the corner. Matsuri and Eri share kindness to protect world peace. Nagumo, Niikura, and Wako find a treasure map—let the battle begin! Another peaceful day in CITY.

Tanabe loves handing out awards for anything and everything, and now she begins the search for Nagumo! Tsurubishi visits the izakaya 'Yamabushi,' eager to get the iconic 'Boss! The usual!' and starts frequenting it. Niikura chases after a pendant that got caught on a 'Mimineko.' Matsuri and Eri embark on a big adventure chasing the Mimineko. The lives of each person intersect in CITY.

Nagumo is taken away by Tanabe. Their destination is the Tanabe Residence Hospitality Twin Towers. With the help of a kind person they meet along the way, Nagumo and Wako try to escape, but the guardians on each floor block their path... Meanwhile, Niikura continues to run recklessly, chasing the Mimineko. Disconnected dots begin to connect in CITY!

The Adataras' morning is always busy. Umi, Sora, Kamome, Tatsuta, and Ryota, all head off together as usual. An anonymous manuscript titled 'Kanki-kun' arrives at the CITY magazine editorial office. Feeling something special about it, Todoroki makes a proposal to Onikamaboko. At the riverside at dusk, Eri tries to convey something to Matsuri... The seasons of CITY continue to change.

Taking over for the owner of Café Yamabushi, Tsurubishi sets out to make the ultimate fried rice. With pride, he embarks on a journey to find the perfect ingredients. Late night, Niikura is struck by hunger and eats whatever she can. Meanwhile, Kuratake, the barber known as “the baddest guy in CITY,” been selling off gifts from his regulars. In CITY, there’s no light without a little darkness.

A girl in love can’t stop sighing. After 18 years of waiting for an invitation, Tanabe finally learns his crush’s favorite food?! Tekaridake casts Nagumo as the lead in "Throat". Despite endless NGs, he powers through—and the curtain rises! A police officer becomes a fan of Riko Izumi. Tatewaku, too, ends up asking her out. Something is blooming in CITY.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Dekin no Mogura: The Earthbound Mole

episodes.titleEn: At a Certain Location in Tokyo
episodes.synopsis: Magi and Yaeko, two liberal arts students, have a fateful encounter with the strange Mogura.
Mogura describes the hell on Earth he experienced when he was drafted.
Magi and Yaeko are introduced to true exorcisms.

episodes.titleEn: The Mystery of the Mad Dog and the Red Panda
episodes.titleJp: 狂犬とレッサーパンダの怪
episodes.synopsis: Magi's workplace becomes infested with spirits.
Magi's younger brother is disturbed to discover his friend's family doting on an old child's doll.
Shio learns that Kyoshiro's mother Kyoko has her own unique supernatural ability.

episodes.titleEn: The Trap of Only Seeing Results
episodes.synopsis: Sakurako takes home a maneki-neko in accordance with Kyoko's vision, but her problems remain unresolved.
Yaeko invites Mogura and the others to visit her hometown during its merfolk festival.

currentlyAiring.titleJp: 美男高校地球防衛部ハイカラ！

episodes.titleJp: 浪漫革命 ハイカラだぜ！
episodes.synopsis:
Once upon a time, there was a hero who protected the Earth from a great crisis... And now, in the face of another crisis, a new hero is born from Binan High School's "Earth Defense Club"! ...Huh? Who were those former heroes? Well, it was "those guys", "those guys". ...Huh? Why are you blurring out the names? It's a multi-verse setting, so mumble mumble... (vague)　

Anyway, the new defense department - Unzen Shinkuro, Sukayu Narushi, Unohana Sousuke, Oshamanbe Ushio and Aso Akuta.

episodes.titleJp: ノリがいいって ハイカラだぜ！
episodes.synopsis: With the help of the feline science of the mysterious future cat Nuru, the five members of the Defense Club have become the "Hi-CARA Romantic Squad" and successfully defeated the monsters plotting to take over the Earth. Then, before them appears the "Ban-CARA Avant Guard Corps", an Earth Conquest Club led by the mysterious prairie dog Master Kyan. Their true identities are none other than Doumeki Straight, Nyutou Samon and Nekoma Tasuku, roommates at the Kurotama Dorm and members of the Binan High School Student Council. With lies and enemies under the same roof, it's impossible for something not to happen... right?

episodes.titleJp: この木 呟樹 ハイカラだぜ！
episodes.synopsis: Once a month, Binan High School's Handsome Boys Contest is held as a regular event. Since entering the school, Sukayu Narushi has been winning the contest in a row, and is a beauty guru recognized by both himself and others.

episodes.titleEn: Being a Mom Is Also Hi-CARA!
episodes.titleJp: お母さんって ハイカラだぜ！
episodes.synopsis: For the dorm students who live away from their parents, the absence of their dorm breadwinner is a real crisis for their lives.

episodes.titleEn: Being Hi-CARA at the Swimming Contest!
episodes.titleJp: 水泳大会で ハイカラだぜ！
episodes.synopsis: Summer has arrived in Mayunan City! Mayunan High School's traditional long-distance swimming competition is to be held at Otokoran Beach, and the Defense Club and other students are in high spirits.

episodes.titleEn: Be Hi-CARA at the Ninja Village!
episodes.titleJp: 忍者の里で ハイカラだぜ！
episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation has begun at Binan High School, and Aso Sorata returns home with the gluttonous Oshamanbe, whom he caught with mountain delicacies. Waiting for them in their hometown are Aso's three younger brothers.

episodes.titleEn: Being Hi-CARA on the Crab Cannery Ship!
episodes.titleJp: 蟹工船で ハイカラだぜ！

episodes.titleEn: It's Hi-CARA Even If Your Stomach Hurts!
episodes.titleJp: 胃が痛くても ハイカラだぜ！

episodes.synopsis: It is 1840, year 1 of Japan's Tenpo era. There lies a small village known as Kadono that is home to the siblings Jinta and Suzune. Jinta is quickly dispatched to slay demons.
Jinta changes his name to Jinya and departs Kadono. Ten years pass and he is now a ronin living in Edo, well-known by the locals as "the demon slayer."
Three years have passed from the Nihonbashi incident. Jinya hears talk of street killings occurring near a soba shop. The number of dead don't match the number of missing.
Jinya and Natsu get attacked by the slasher thought to be a demon. After Mosuke arrives to help and Jinya brandishes his blade, the demon quickly vanishes into the darkness.
In the fall of 1853, a samurai by the name of Naotsugu Miura grows concerned about his missing brother. However, everyone insists that he doesn't have a brother.
Jinya and Naotsugu witness a young girl losing her parents in a fire, which brings the unexpected truth of the mystery to light.
In the winter of 1853, Jinya is hired by Jyuuzou to investigate a demonic painting known as "the Ukiyo-e of Kudanzaka" that's said to be cursed.
In the spring of 1854, rumors spread of a demon woman who kills men in the Yoshiwara redlight district. Jinya investigates.
A man named Somegorou Akitsu gifts Natsu a hairpin then crosses paths with Jinya. Somegorou's spirit dogs attack Jinya and he must use his demon powers to defend himself.
In May of 1855, Naotsugu and a woman in a kimono catch sight of a man in the distance who looks different to both. Naotsugu sees his brother and the woman sees an old flame.
In winter of 1856, Zenji brings a liquor to the soba shop and it becomes immensely popular. However, Jinya finds something unsavory about it.
A series of violent incidents occur across Edo, all related to Yuki-no-Nagori. Worse yet, rumors of a woman with blonde hair send chills down Jinya's spine.
It turns out Yuki-no-Nagori is an evil drink. Jinya finds a demon calling out the name "Jinta". As they face off, Jinya suffers from the weakness of his own heart.
Back in the winter of 1839, when Jinya was still just Jinta, there were rumors of strange phenomena occurring near the Modori River. Byakuya orders Jinta to investigate.

episodes.titleEn: Late Night Tales of Demonic Swords ~Hijin~
episodes.synopsis: The year is 1862. The arrival of the Perry Expedition in Japan brings unrest into the cities. Jinya hears about a cursed sword called the "Yatonomori Kaneomi."
In July of 1863, Jinya hears rumors of a demon in Mizuho temple that devours humans. Upon visiting, Jinya comes across a silver-haired fox demon.
In March of 1864, a job comes to Jinya to slay a demon named Okada. Okada has become a crazed murderer willing to kill anyone from fellow samurai to women and children.
In September of 1867, Somegoro Akitsu leaves Kyoto with a tea set that he takes to Jinya. Akitsu wants to find someone who can use the set to conduct a tea ceremony.
Jinya and his daughter, Nomari, enjoy peaceful days staying with Naotsugu and his family. However, time changes all things and their world faces a drastic transformation.
While engaged in a fierce battle with Tsuchiura, Jinya is forced to take on his demonic form, witnessed by both Naotsugu and Nomari.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: There's No Freaking Way I'll be Your Lover! Unless...
currentlyAiring.titleJp: わたしが恋人になれるわけないじゃん、ムリムリ! (※ムリじゃなかった!?)

episodes.titleJp: 恋人とか、ぜったいにムリ!
episodes.synopsis: Renako starts high school determined to leave her introverted self behind and miraculously lands in the top-tier popular group. But keeping up the extrovert act is exhausting. Just as she’s about to break, the school’s princess, Mai Ouzuka, confesses to her!? This isn’t the high school life she imagined!

episodes.titleJp: 初めてのキスなんて、ムリ!
episodes.synopsis:
The showdown between Renako and Mai has begun: best friend or girlfriend?
Mai visits Renako as a “friend,” and they have a blast. Friendship is the best! 
But Mai’s feelings keep growing. Hoping to prove friendship wins, Renako plans a fun weekend outing. Everything's going great… until a sudden downpour flips everything on its head!?

episodes.titleJp: ムリヤリなんて、だめムリ!
episodes.synopsis:
Renako tries to forget the kiss, while Mai leaves for work in Paris. Renako walks home with Ajisai after school, holding hands and making plans to hang out later, too. Mai calls her a cheater, but they're not even dating, so how can she be?!
But then when Ajisai comes over, Mai shows up too, bringing her little sister Haruna. Now it’s a chaotic four-person hangout... What could possibly go wrong?

episodes.titleJp: 真唯なんて、やっぱりムリムリ!（※ムリじゃなかった!?）
episodes.synopsis: Mai skips school, and Renako starts to worry... Maybe she really went too far. But then Satsuki calls her in to reveal the truth. Turns out, a heartbroken Mai told her something crazy... She's planning to join a Suitors Party?! How did it come to this?! Renako rushes to the hotel venue, where she and Mai face off… in swimsuits. Now’s the time. Renako has to finally tell Mai how she really feels!

episodes.titleJp: 恋人とか、ぜったいにムリ!その２
episodes.synopsis:
Satsuki suddenly drops a bomb: “Let’s be girlfriends.” 
It’s clearly revenge for Mai's careless treatment of her. Still, Renako agrees to play along for two weeks if it helps the two make up. 
But why does Ajisai seem bothered? No way… right? Meanwhile, Mai’s as calm as ever. Things are shifting with Satsuki, but is it really headed in the right direction?

episodes.titleJp: ふたりだけのヒミツが多すぎて、もうムリ!
episodes.synopsis:
Satsuki suddenly starts acting all couple-y in front of Mai, much to Renako's confusion. After seeing an unexpected side of Satsuki, Renako dares to admit she's actually an introvert, only to find out Satsuki already knew. Shocked, Renako runs off, but Satsuki finds her, and somehow she ends up spending the night at Satsuki’s place.
Are they really taking a bath together too!?
Wait, why!?

episodes.titleEn: No Freaking Way I'm Surviving This Mess!
episodes.titleJp: 修羅場とか、どうあがいてもムリ!
episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Ajisai-san, Mai finally agrees to talk with Satsuki, and Renako gets roped in as a witness. Just when it seems like they’ll make up, Satsuki drops a secret photo of her and Renako! Wait, what?! Things spiral out of control and somehow it’s turned into an FPS showdown??! There’s no way Renako's losing… absolutely no way…!

episodes.titleEn: A Perfect Win? No Freaking Way!
episodes.titleJp: 完全勝利するなんて、ムリムリ!
episodes.synopsis: After their FPS practice, Renako stays the night at Satsuki’s. “Thanks for letting me face Mai,” Satsuki smiles, making Renako wish they’d just make up already. The long-awaited showdown begins! Mai’s flawless aim, Renako’s sharp instincts… and Satsuki struggling to keep up. But Renako can’t let her lose without a fight!

episodes.titleJp: 紫陽花さんのお宅訪問とか、ムリ!
episodes.synopsis:
紗月さんの件が一段落した夏休み、紫陽花さんの家に遊びに行くれな子。
そこで、いつも優しい笑顔の陰に人知れぬ苦悩があるってわかっちゃった。
だから、紫陽花さんの家出宣言を聞いて、わたしも力になりたいって思ったんだ。
ふたりで向かう先は温泉！ひと夏の逃避旅行で、紫陽花さんとの距離が縮まっていって―。
大丈夫、紫陽花さんはどこにだって行けるんだから！

currentlyAiring.titleJp: ネクロノミ子のコズミックホラーショウ

episodes.titleEn: [No Spoilers!] Let's Play the Old Ones' Demo [Cthulhu]
episodes.titleJp: 【初見】邪神ゲーム体験版やってみた【クトゥルフ】
episodes.synopsis: Struggling streamer Miko Kurono joins the new VR game "KADATH" to change her fate, after a wave of mysterious incidents where popular streamers collapse during livestreams. She soon discovers the game is a deadly trap by the gods and must survive the unfolding cosmic horror.

episodes.titleJp: 【正気度】弱ライバーで集まってみた【旧支配者】

episodes.titleJp: 【グルメ】一日復活した邪神に呼び出されてみた【古都】

episodes.titleJp: 【邪神覚醒】決戦！京都タワーディフェンス【クトゥグア】
episodes.synopsis: The battle to defend Kyoto from the Great Old Ones' armies begins.

episodes.titleEn: [Putting Out Fires] Miko and Kanna's TV Shot! [Top Cultist]
episodes.titleJp: 【火消し】ミコとカンナでテレビ出演してみた【教祖】
episodes.synopsis: Humanity begins to go mad as the last game approaches.

episodes.titleEn: [Finals] Crying Out Family in the Mountains of Madness [Hastur]
episodes.titleJp: 【決勝戦】狂気山脈にて、家族愛を叫ぶ【ハスター】
episodes.synopsis: The last game begins at the Mountains of Madness.

episodes.titleJp: 【育成】自分メーカーでときめいてみた【ガタノソア】
episodes.synopsis: 清司郎によりハスターが倒されたのもつかの間、次の相手ガタノソアは自らが制作したゲームをクリアすることを要求。それはカンナの神経を逆撫でするものだった。
Sakamoto enjoys a quiet life in retirement with his family. But one day, an old colleague demands he return to the assassin world — or face consequences.
While out on an errand, Sakamoto and Shin encounter Lu Shaotang, the daughter of a mafia boss, who's on the run and targeted by twin assassins.

episodes.titleJp: シュガーパークへようこそ！
episodes.synopsis: After learning of the huge bounty on Sakamoto's head, the crew tries to enjoy a family outing at the amusement park while fending off assassins.
With the poison-wielding hitman taken out, the Sakamotos head to their next attraction, where they're ambushed by Dondenkai Ltd's ultimate assassin duo.
Sakamoto goes all out in a fierce one-on-one duel with Boiled. Meanwhile, ORDER members are tasked with handling a serial case targeting assassins.
Hoping to win the million-yen prize, Team Sakamoto enters the shopping district's survival tournament and teams up with a completely clueless sniper.
While manning the store alone, Lu gets kidnapped by a mysterious group. Sakamoto and Shin pursue her but are halted by an invisible assassin.
To rescue Lu, Sakamoto and Shin infiltrate a top-secret lab seized by assassins. Meanwhile, in the prison cell, Lu meets someone from Shin's childhood.
In the depths of the Lab, Shin and Heisuke join forces to take down the invisible assailant, while Sakamoto engages in an intense battle against Kashima.
Exhausted from their battle, the crew heads to a local bathhouse but finds it too dangerous to relax. Later, a mysterious man arrives in search of Lu.
The crew faces Wutang in a high-stakes casino showdown to learn who issued Sakamoto's bounty. Meanwhile, X sends a group of vicious assassins their way.
As Sakamoto gathers intel on the assassins targeting him, ORDER begins hunting the death row inmates.  Later, Shin and Lu face a deadly assault.
Saw's attacks push Shin and Lu to awaken new abilities, turning the tables on the deadly killer. Meanwhile, Dump ambushes Osaragi at a temple.
The battles rage on even as the crew gets treated by Granny Miya! Minimalist threatens Aoi at the store while Heisuke clashes with Apart at Tokyo Tower.
Despite his inability to lose weight, Sakamoto faces off against Apart in a fierce showdown. Later, X reveals his dangerous plans for the assassin world.
While X and Gaku invade the JAA, a lone ORDER assassin stands in their way. Amid the chaos, Sakamoto discovers the shocking truth about X's identity.
Sakamoto decides to infiltrate his alma mater to get more intel on X. But first, he must conquer the sky-high requirements of the JCC entrance exam.
It's every assassin for themselves as the exam takes to the skies. While Sakamoto impresses fellow candidate Akira, Shin takes on the germaphobe Mafuyu.
Stage Three of the JCC exams begins as a trio of special applicants joins the fray. Toramaru, a devoted Sakamoto fan, immediately clashes with Shin.
Iori receives a letter from his little sister back home. Note: This is still a diving anime.
Shiori's here and on a mission! How will Iori handle this situation?
Aina is out of control! But why?
Aina has a spare ticket for the Oumi Women's University Festival, and it causes all sorts of chaos.

episodes.titleEn: First Time at a Women's University
episodes.synopsis: Iori and Kohei attend the All-Girls College Festiva, but the girls ask them to help out at the cafe.
After being expelled from college, the boys devise various plans to get back into it.

episodes.titleJp: シャルピー衝撃試験／大人の林間学校
episodes.synopsis: Iori and his class need to cooperate and do a very dangerous experiment together.
Iori runs into a familiar face at his new part-time job, and this is going to complicate matters!

currentlyAiring.titleJp: ニャイト・オブ・ザ・リビングキャット

episodes.synopsis: The world is plunged into chaos due to a virus that turns people into cats through contact with infected cats.

episodes.titleEn: Tonight the Cats Steal the Stars
episodes.synopsis: Kunagi, Kaoru, and Tanishi take shelter in a supermarket, where Kaoru reunites with a friend.
Kaoru treats the gang to her special "cat rice," but their respite is short-lived.

episodes.titleEn: The Cat Is a Harsh Master
episodes.titleJp: 猫は無慈悲な世界の王
episodes.synopsis: Kunagi and crew make it to the top of a building where a rescue chopper waits, but it's already at capacity...
Kunagi and Kaoru meet a man named Arata, who invites them to the citadel where he's been taking refuge.
Grandma, leader of Wendelstein, sends Kunagi and crew to a mall to search for a team that's gone missing.

episodes.titleEn: The Feline D-REX from Another World
episodes.synopsis: At the mall, Kunagi and crew meet a cat that somehow understands human language and writing.
Kunagi and crew have finished gathering supplies, but now they suddenly face a cat riding on a bear...

episodes.titleJp: 海野君の初恋相手は誰ですか？
episodes.synopsis: Hiro moves in with Nagi, Sachi and Erika. Friction arises, but they're reminded of what happiness might mean.

episodes.titleEn: Onii Confessed to You, Didn't He?
episodes.titleJp: お兄に告白されてたよね･･･?
episodes.synopsis: Hiro is kidnapped and Nagi immediately sets out to save her.

episodes.titleJp: それを100倍にした感じかな
episodes.synopsis: Nagi is suddenly hit with the truth about Ai’s real objective.
Hiro is preparing for a festival that's about to be held at her shrine.

episodes.titleJp: 私の人生でもあるんだからね！！
episodes.synopsis: The world now knows the face of singer Mochizuki Ai, who created the song “Arc Fault.”

episodes.titleEn: There's No Way I Can Be Normal!!
episodes.titleJp: 普通でいられるわけないでしょ…！！
