episodes.titleJp: だって俺たちが切り拓くんだから…！
episodes.synopsis: Ai shows up in Nagi's and Erika's hotel room.

episodes.titleEn: No Such Thing as a Meaningless Kiss
episodes.titleJp: 意味のないキスなんてない
episodes.synopsis: Nagi and Hiro prepare for their wedding.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: The Rising of the Shield Hero Season 4
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 盾の勇者の成り上がり Season 4

episodes.synopsis: Naofumi stops at Siltvelt on his journey to Q'ten Lo. The people there worship him as a king.
Naofumi and Raph-chan stay in the castle while the rest of the party tours the town.
Siltvelt castle is rocked by the attempted poisoning at breakfast.
Fohl battles the cunning and sneaky Jaralis while Atla challenges the veteran warrior Lyceras.
When Fohl is about to be defeated, Naofumi asks him if he has the resolve to become stronger.
Naofumi returns, temporarily, to Lurolona Village, and decides who he’s going to take with him.
In Q’ten Lo, the party finds that it’s forbidden to kill an animal, and that the people are heavily taxed.
The Emperor’s blessing causes the “Sealed Orochi” to revive.
After botching another match, bowling club captain Mai struggles to keep the club fun for all of its members.

episodes.titleJp: 迷って、アウトスパット
episodes.synopsis: The girls find themselves in the past facing immediate danger when a handsome young 'B' comes to their rescue.

episodes.titleJp: 頼って、バランスライン
episodes.synopsis: The girls deal with Suguri's eccentric sisters while brainstorming ways to get home without affecting history.
Mai forgets her promise and asks Sumomo to build a bowling lane while Rina wrestles with her inner struggles.

episodes.titleJp: すれ違って、フックボール
episodes.synopsis: After losing her ball while testing out a "plan B" to get home, Nozomi starts to find common ground with Anzu.

episodes.titleJp: 飛び越えて、リバースフック
episodes.synopsis: With bandits roaming nearby, the girls learn from their hosts about life and values in the Sengoku period.

episodes.titleEn: Hold On to the Loft Ball
episodes.titleJp: 抱きしめたい、ロフトボール
episodes.synopsis: The long-lost eldest sister Natsume unexpectedly returns home from her travels without her mysterious partner.

episodes.titleJp: 驚きのブラインドスコア
episodes.synopsis: As they enjoy the hot spring and learn more about their hosts and each other, the girls uncover a new mystery.

currentlyAiring.titleJp: クレバテス-魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者-

episodes.synopsis: An expedition of heroes challenges a powerful monster that keeps mankind trapped on a single continent.
Alicia and Clevatess are captured by a group of foul bandits.
Nell is punished for her dreams of freedom.
Clevatess and Alicia's time at the bandit camp nears its end.
Clevatess and Alicia are suddenly attacked by an unexpected opponent.
Alicia and Nelluru stop at a small village after destroying the bandits.
Drel's wizards come to steal Luna away.
Alicia continues her battle against the wizards.
The battle intensifies as Drel's army reaches Hiderat.

The town of Domori may be plagued by mysterious phenomena, but things are not going well for Class 5-3's new homeroom teacher Meisuke Nueno, either. Right from the start, Nueno, or "Nube" for short, becomes the target of fifth-grader Hiroshi's bursts of rage. After witnessing something bizarre, Nueno suspects there may be an otherworldly reason behind Hiroshi's sudden personality change.

Nueno uses his ultimate weapon Demon Hand to exorcise the Yokai possessing Hiroshi. But suddenly, the mysterious and handsome Tamamo appears, kidnapping Hiroshi right before Nueno's eyes! As Nueno gives chase, Tamamo makes preparations throughout town for an unknown ritual. Just why did he kidnap Hiroshi, and what is his true identity?

An unsettling shadow appears in the school in the dead of night. It's rumored that an honor student is erasing blackboards, replacing flowers of flower vases, and cleaning the rabbit cages when there should be no one there. To get to the truth of the matter, Hiroshi and his friends sneak into the school, only to encounter a voice in the dark saying, "Let's be friends!"

After witnessing Nueno's amazing power, Miki becomes obsessed with gaining psychic abilities. She even tries to train while sleeping. When her efforts produce an unusual result, she joyfully celebrates her success. However, her friends are far from impressed. In fact, they are scared of what Miki has become.

Katsuya will do anything to make his sister Manami happy, even if it means he has to run around borrowing money. That is how he unwittingly falls victim to the evil spirit Hatamonba's trap. When he realizes Hatemonba's deadly blade is not only pointing at his own neck, but also his sister's, he runs to Nueno for help. However, Hatamonba's sword appears to be mightier than Nueno's Demon Hand.

Fear grips Makoto after he hears about Teketeke, the spirit of a girl who lost her lower body in a railway accident. According to the story, now she wanders the world in search of new legs. Makoto grows desperate for help upon learning that the spirit is coming for him within three days. However, Nueno urges him to forget everything, insisting that Teketeke is nothing more than a myth.

As unseasonable snow blankets the town of Domori, a beautiful young woman appears before Nueno. Her name is Yukime, and she has come to fulfill a promise she made to him five years ago. Excited by their teacher's improbable romance, Nueno's students sneakily tag along on their date, only to witness Yukime's frosty intentions.

episodes.titleEn: Great Inventions and Spirit World Communicators
episodes.synopsis: Young inventor Akira finds a broken tablet and becomes even more obsessed with building great machines, as if he is possessed by something. One day, Akira announces he can bring the dead back to life, scaring his friends. Nueno senses something is wrong and investigates Akira's inventions, when he notices something strange within Akira's tablet...

Zashiki-warashi is a yokai that brings happiness to humans. When Nube encounters one, he offers her a snack and she quickly grows attached to him. Before long, all of Class 5-3 starts to have amazingly good luck! Wanting to return the favor, the kindhearted Makoto and his friends hatch a plan to thank her, only to uncover glimpses into her sorrowful past.
The sextuplets are back again.
The sextuplets suddenly get a craving for watermelon.
Ichimatsu gets a hair cut.
The sextuplets and their friends get ready for a temple festival.
The sextuplets need some rest after the last episode and then Karamatsu and Todomatsu meet a fishing hermit.

episodes.titleJp: 扇風機とタイムマシン
episodes.synopsis: The sextuplets travel back in time to get themselves a working fan after theirs broke.
Let's see some classic fairytales, Mr. Osomatsu style.
商店街を荒らし回る一匹のドロボーネコ。店主たちが手を焼く中、ついにトト子の実家の魚屋も被害に遭い、さすがの６つ子も黙ってはいられない。この状況にひとり何かを思う一松は……？

episodes.titleEn: Don't Admit Defeat Even If You're Dead! A Delinquent in Denji Heian-kyo!
episodes.titleJp: 死んでも負けを認めんな！ヤンキー、電祇平安京に立つ！
episodes.synopsis: After an accident, teenage delinquent Takeru wakes up to find the literal girl of his dreams standing there.

episodes.titleEn: You Can't Build Trust With Words! This Delinquent Will Be an Onmyoji
episodes.titleJp: 信頼ってのは言葉じゃ作れねえ！ヤンキー、陰陽師になる
episodes.synopsis: Takeru wakes up in Denji Heian-kyo again, but nobody remembers him or believes his stories about fighting oni.

episodes.titleEn: Don't Just Focus on What You Can See! Yura's Wavering Feelings
episodes.titleJp: 見えるモンばっかり見るな！ユラ、揺れる想い
episodes.synopsis: When Takeru proves to be a good battle partner for Atsunaga, Yura has some difficult decisions to make.

episodes.titleEn: Don't Get Used to Being Alone! Takeru's First Centennial Pandemonium!
episodes.titleJp: ひとりに慣れるな！タケル、初めての百年夜行
episodes.synopsis: Seimei plans to put Takeru's explosive but unpredictable power to use in the upcoming Centennial Pandemonium.

episodes.titleEn: Come On Down, Once-in-a-Millennium Me! The Yasha Mask That Guides Takeru
episodes.titleJp: 千年に一人の俺、降りてこい！タケルを導く夜叉の面
episodes.synopsis: After the trauma of losing a Centennial Pandemonium fight, Takeru becomes afraid to enter the black mist.

episodes.titleEn: This Time I'll Protect You! What Appeared Beyond the Centennial Pandemonium
episodes.titleJp: 今度は守る！百年夜行の先に見えたもの
episodes.synopsis: Takeru's power reaches all new heights, but revelations await him during the next Centennial Pandemonium.

episodes.titleEn: Say It Ain't So! The Truth About Denji Heian-kyo Is Revealed
episodes.titleJp: 嘘だと言ってくれ！明かされる電祇平安京の真実
episodes.synopsis: Seimei explains to Takeru the shocking truth regarding how things work in Denji Heian-kyo.

episodes.titleEn: Don't Screw Around With People Desperately Trying to Get By! The Wailing of Seiryu Tower
episodes.titleJp: 必死に生きてる奴を馬鹿にすんじゃねぇ！慟哭の青龍塔
episodes.synopsis: Takeru decides to aid Tsukimiya in thwarting Seimei's World Whittle. Their first stop, Seiryu Tower.

episodes.titleEn: Fight Me for Real! Takeru vs. Seimei, Souls Going Mano a Mano
episodes.titleJp: 本気で殴り合え！タケルVS晴明、魂のタイマン!!
episodes.synopsis: As Takeru destroys the Towers of the Four Gods one by one, Seimei chooses to personally face him in combat.
Jyouji Ema becomes curious about his strange classmate, Miyoshi Hayashi, who keeps asking if he is adorable.

episodes.titleEn: Would You Be My Friend? / The Artist
episodes.titleJp: 友達になってくれませんか＆描く派
episodes.synopsis: A two-part story where Hayashi meets Megumi and Komatsu, and how his interests coincide with theirs.

currentlyAiring.titleJp: うたごえはミルフィーユ

episodes.synopsis: April. Uta, a freshman, is starting high school and aims to join the light music club. However, when she sees the glamorous boys and girls of the light music club chatting away, her extremely negative personality makes her hesitant to take the first step.

Uta struggles with her first a cappella practice. Meanwhile, a new member candidate found by club president Airi becomes a hot topic. All the club members go out to recruit her to take on the role of "voice percussion," a unique part of a cappella.

episodes.titleJp: 夏の始まりのカコフォニィ
わたしたちのアカペラ

episodes.synopsis: Senku and his companions finally set off for America in search of corn. However, a dispute arises between Ryusui and Senku shortly after they depart.
Maintaining morale will be critical on the long journey to the Americas. Knowing where on the ocean you are is pretty important, too. The crew of the Perseus discuss.
The Perseus lands in the Americas. They first head to Northern California in search of yellow dent corn, but discover a lot more than that.
The search party narrowly escaped enemy machine gun fire. Unfortunately, the respite was short-lived.
Tensions rise as Dr. Xeno makes his introductions to the Perseus.
Stanley orders Luna to infiltrate the Perseus and identify Doctor Taiju. Things go sideways when it turns out to be a little too easy.
Senku had gotten his start in rocket building through an email exchange with Doctor Xeno. Their approaches to science soon diverged.
NASA scientist Dr. Xeno attempts to pick off the leader of the Kingdom of Science.
With Senku having been shot, the Kingdom of Science plots its retaliation against Dr. Xeno.
With Senku still confined to the bed, Chrome's team begins work on the tunnel to Xeno's base.

episodes.titleEn: Those Who Know the Rules; Those Who Make Them
episodes.titleJp: ルールを知る者創る者
episodes.synopsis: Ryusui and Senku take to the skies in a science versus science dogfight while Xeno's forces mount a ground counterattack.
Xeno's army attacks and when all seems lost, Chrome and his friends finish the tunnel and capture Xeno.
The team head to the source of the petrification beam in South America as they flee from Stanley's ship.
Senku and company must flee from Stanley's ship, but they have to make stops to refuel.
With Stanley's ship hot on their tail, can science help Senku and company escape?
The team is going to need a weapon for when Stanley inevitably catches up to them.
Senku and his team have lost Stanley for now, but they aren't out of -- or rather, in -- the woods just yet.
The team discovers a giant pile of petrification devices. They take them apart to see what makes them tick.
The team begins making, digging for, and polishing diamonds to replace the burnt-out ones inside the devices.

episodes.titleEn: What I Once Sought to Destroy
episodes.titleJp: かつて消そうとしたものは
episodes.synopsis: Suika is in charge of making sure Senku's plan works, but her kindness becomes an obstacle.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: I Was Reincarnated as the 7th Prince so I Can Take My Time Perfecting My Magical Ability Season 2
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 転生したら第七王子だったので、気ままに魔術を極めます 第2期

episodes.synopsis: Lloyd's interest in divine sorcery is piqued as a means of fighting off further demonic invasions.
After teleporting in the direction of a presence he sensed, Lloyd and Grim arrive in the realm of angels.
Having learned the divine sorcery he was looking for, Lloyd searches for some undead to test it on.
Tao, Ren, and Sylpha encounter an undead with an incredibly dangerous power in the sewers.
After Babylon's brutal defeat by the mysterious pastor, Lloyd's friends search for clues to his identity.
Lloyd's group discovers a gruesome secret beneath the church, leaving Escher to question her faith.
Lloyd's group organizes to protect the bishops during the Advent festival.
Battle breaks out through the city as Lloyd's friends seek to defend against the unholy legion.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: Dealing with Mikadono Sisters Is a Breeze
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

episodes.synopsis: Yu Ayase transfers to a school for prodigies—but despite his gifted mother, he's perfectly mediocre.
Tasked with looking out for the sisters, Yu tries to win them over—through their stomachs.

episodes.titleEn: I Want Us to Be a Family
episodes.synopsis: Yu begins to get to know the three sisters, and they start to see him as more than just an unwelcome guest.

episodes.titleEn: A Memory the Sisters Can Share
episodes.synopsis: Yu carries out his plan to have the sisters enjoy the Cherry Blossom Night Festival together.
The three sisters grow closer after the festival... and then their father comes home.
As Kazuki prepares for her most challenging role yet, she asks Yu on a date to get in the mindset.

episodes.titleEn: You Will Win No Matter What
episodes.synopsis: Yu throws himself into intense training with Niko's help, preparing for his one-on-one showdown with Hayato.
Niko wins the battle against Hayato, so she says to Yu “I’ll grant you any wish” for doing his best for her.

currentlyAiring.titleEn: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess
currentlyAiring.titleJp: 傷だらけ聖女より報復をこめて

episodes.synopsis: Lua, known as the Defective Saint, risks her life to save her beloved, Garrot. However, her achievement is stolen by her best friend, Arian, and the two become engaged. Having lost everything, Lua vows to take revenge on those who believed in her.
After being betrayed by Arian, Rua is visited by the second prince, Sven. Sven proposes revenge, and Rua learns of the shocking dark secrets of the temple.

Rua searches for information on the Yuan tribe at the royal palace library in order to discover the high priest's secret. That night, she witnesses a secret meeting between the high priest, the Yuan tribe, and Arian...?
Rua teams up with Sven, who suggests that the two of them infiltrate Viscount Dedmond's ball to find evidence of his wrongdoing. Meanwhile, Ariane is also planning to go to the ball with Garrote.
Rua decides to infiltrate Viscount Dedmond's ball, but due to previous harassment, she doesn't have a suitable dress for a ball. Luckily, Prince Swen is now at her side.
At Dedmond's ball, Rua encounters Ariane again, who isn't provoked by her taunts. But when a servant appears at the ball with a knife, she makes another decision.
In order to obtain important documents from Viscount Dedmond, Rua entices him to meet alone in his chamber. Prince Swen strongly disagrees with this plan.
Rua and Prince Swen manage to get hold of the documents in question when a ferocious monster suddenly appears. Is Ariane involved this time? What's her purpose?

episodes.titleJp: 全ての終わり、そして始まり
episodes.synopsis: Kyle is sent back in time after his fateful fight with the demon king and swears to save the world this time.
Kyle sets about making preparations for his heroic journey and the fight to come.
Kyle reunites with some old companions in new ways before making his first major play to change the future.

episodes.titleEn: The Perfect Start to a Heroic Tale
episodes.titleJp: 上出来な英雄譚の始まり
episodes.synopsis: To save the ill-fated Princess Milena, Kyle must brave a danger the likes of which he's never faced before.
Old friends become enemies as Kyle comes up with a plan to get Princess Milena to safety.
Kyle's party is celebrated for rescuing the princess, but they're given no time to rest on their laurels.
Kyle's party arrives in Karan and becomes embroiled in tensions between Zirgus and the Gargan Empire.

episodes.titleEn: Those Who Act Out of Sight
episodes.synopsis: A number of unsettling and violent attacks take place across the city of Karan.
Kyle insists on finding the secret underground passage hidden beneath Karan.

episodes.titleJp: ムームーと電子レンジ
天空橋とワイヤレス送電
ムームーとコンセント
ムームーと空気清浄機
ムームーとアクションカメラ
天空橋と嘘とビデオテープ
アキヒロとタンクレストイレ

currentlyAiring.titleJp: 追放者食堂へようこそ!

episodes.synopsis: Dennis, cast out of a top-tier adventuring party, decides to follow his dreams and open his own restaurant.

episodes.titleJp: めっちゃおいしいです！
episodes.synopsis: The Adventurer's Restaurant is open at last, and their first customer is...someone wearing full plate armor?!
A boy named Vivia comes to the restaurant. He's been cast out of his party, so he may deign to join a new one.

episodes.titleEn: Then, I'll Have the Daily Special
episodes.titleJp: じゃあ、日替わり定食で
episodes.synopsis: Bachel has been thoroughly ground down by her crushing workload. Then another scolding pushes her to the edge.

episodes.titleEn: It's Too Soon for a Marriage Proposal!
episodes.titleJp: プロポーズなんて早すぎるだろ！
episodes.synopsis: The restaurant is booming, but Dennis is worried about Atelier! Katie approaches Dennis with a request.

episodes.titleJp: アトリエお嬢様お迎えに上がりました
episodes.synopsis: The Workstatt family butler arrives to retrieve Atelier. He tells Dennis and the others of her tragic past.
The restaurant is packed, but Dennis falls ill. As he dreams of his youth, the others try to cook for him.

episodes.titleEn: Today, We Are Closed for Business Reasons
episodes.titleJp: 本日、所用につき臨時休業
episodes.synopsis: It's a cause for celebration as three of the regulars at the restaurant have acquired new jobs. While the group soaks in the hot springs and enjoys some barbecue, a shadow lurks around the temporarily closed establishment.

episodes.titleEn: If It's Important to You, Then Please Don't Let Go of It!
episodes.titleJp: 大事なものなら、手放さないでください！
episodes.synopsis: Dennis and Atelier decide to leave town to protect their friends, but familiar figures block their way.
The witchlings address an unfolding disaster at City Hall, but Sekai foresees a greater disaster to come.
As the RD struggles to keep the outbreak under control, Sekai rushes to save the people of her old church.

episodes.titleJp: フラグメント -Energy of will-
episodes.synopsis: The witchlings debate the fallout from their last mission while the RD Chief struggles to understand.
The witchlings are left reeling from a sudden betrayal as disappearances rise around the city.
The witchlings are forced to run from suspicious townspeople while trying to find and stop Kugel.
Exploring Kugel's memories forces the witchlings to confront a shocking truth about their world.
As time ticks down for Kamitsubaki CIty, Kafu confronts the forces preventing her from singing.

episodes.titleJp: ブラックアウト -Beginning of the end-
episodes.synopsis: Maxwell prepares to unleash hell on Kamitsubaki City, but the witchlings are far from a united front.
Yaiba Kurogane is determined to become a true samurai, but things take an odd turn in the jungle.
Yaiba has come up with a plan and is willing to do nearly anything to provoke Onimaru to a duel.
Onimaru now wants to fight Yaiba, but something's off, not least the horns sprouting from his head.
Yaiba has the Raijinken but it's the Thunder God that turns the tables on him. Then there's Onimaru.
Yaiba et al. head to Ganryu Island to learn about an arcane maken but end up at a shady hot spring.
Yaiba and crew are back on track but stop in Nagoya where there's more in store than great food.
Yaiba and his companions finally reach Ganryujima, where they encounter Mr. Spider — and a resurrected, but somewhat peeved, Sasaki Kojiro.
Musashi and Kojiro's duel must proceed as recorded so Yaiba can return to his original time, but Yaiba's careless comment threatens to change history.
Needing to develop a new sword technique that can counter Onimaru, Yaiba undergoes further grueling training with Musashi — and a scheming Kojiro.
Yaiba and his companions storm Onimaru Castle, but they fall through a trap into the depths of the stronghold and face Onimaru's new henchmen.

episodes.titleJp: 雷神剣 VS 風神剣
episodes.synopsis: While Yaiba rides high, Onimaru tempts the young hero. And in pure Yaiba fashion, eyebrows rise.

episodes.titleJp: 大和撫子がやってきた
episodes.synopsis: A showdown's heating up between Yaiba and Onimaru, but the neighborhood rumor mill is even hotter.
Yaiba and his friends seek the Dragon God Orb at Lake Biwa, unaware that Onimaru has summoned a legendary swordsman from the past to attack them.
Lake Biwa's orb surprises, but it's Shikoku's Mt. Tsurugi that hides a shadowy and dangerous threat.

episodes.titleJp: 対決！妖術師 VS 刃
episodes.synopsis: Team Yaiba may have secured the Gold Orb on Shikoku, but it's on to Kyushu, and on Yaiba's back.
Troupe Yaiba traipses to Nara for a pivotal tip-off, but it's an odd traveling warrior who shows up.
Yaiba battles Goemon using the Orb of Giants only to lose two of the spheres to the villain's guile.
Jubei's giving Yaiba and team a fighting chance, but that's before they meet the ninja army.
Yaiba et al. unmask the nature of Goemon's orb, and it's unlike anything they've encountered before.

episodes.titleEn: The Ruse of Basho the Monkey
episodes.synopsis: The team is eager to grab the illusive final prize, but a decrepit temple and old man stand defiant.
